author: dlr
msg: JavaHL: Fix incorrect class name in doc string.

author: sussman
msg: Make text-conflicts prompt the user during updates and merges.
This new feature can be avoided with --non-interactive, or disabled
permanently by setting '[miscellany] interactive-conflicts = no' in
(svn_wc_conflict_description_t):  rename some fields to match new enum.
(svn_wc__merge_internal):  parse result enum, and possibly install a
fulltext rather than mark file conflicted.
(svn_config_ensure):  create new config var in config file.
(main):  look for new runtime variable, install either the
interactive conflict callback, or no callback.
(create_config_dir):  python tests all share a single runtime config file;

author: dlr
msg: * STATUS: Vote for backport of issue #2804 (r25586 group).

author: kameshj
msg: Testcase to prove the following defect.
When a working copy has no mergeinfo (due to local full revert of all merges),
and merge is attempted for some other revision rX, The new mergeinfo should be
/merge/src: rX not all the reverted ones reappearing along with rX.
